law.catch_line: Restraint Of Dogs In Public Highway Rest Areas; Penalty
law.text: [ Text of section effective until October 31, 2012. For text effective October 31, 2012, see below.] Whoever is the owner or keeper of a dog shall restrain said dog by a chain or leash when in an officially designated public highway rest area. Whoever violates the provisions of this section shall be punished by a fine of not more than fifty dollars. Chapter 140: Restraint of dogs in public highway rest areas; penalty [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 193, Sec. 46 effective October 31, 2012. For text effective until October 31, 2012, see above.] Whoever is the owner or keeper of a dog shall restrain said dog by a chain or leash when in an officially designated public highway rest area. Whoever violates the provisions of this section shall be punished by a fine of not more than $100.
